name: The Birds
overview: A straight-ahead shooter without much complexity. You are a grand avian being flying over a beautiful coral reef but your way is blocked by other birds, dragons and sea-salt encrusted sea creatures that leap and bite at you. Your only hope is your short-range blast attack. Send feathers flying and gain points and the ability to proceed forward on your quest. If you have a bird who's loud song has been waking you up too early in the mornings this would certainly be a way to blow off some steam as you blast these seabirds to bits. May your aim be true or the next shriek you hear could be your own!
